reviewText: La Cenicienta al estilo sexi comedia con Sasha Montenegro. El disco contiene la version completa de la pelicula sin cortos. La qualidad de la imagen es buena pero pienso podria ser mejor, es por eso de las 4 estrellas. Recomendada.
great movie if you like funny stuff intertaining but not for kids only for adults for all purposes very recomended.

this film had some nice nude shots of sasha montenegro you pretty much see all of her in different shots which is alway nice in any movie and their another women in the film with some nice shots of her as well. but sasha is the main course with a body like hers no wonder. but for a interesting film with some tasty nice nude shots of sasha montenegro this a good movie to get.

In "La golfa del barrio" ("The Neighborhood Tramp" from 1982), Sasha Montenegro played 'Rosa Maria'. This was basically a sexed-up version of "My Fair Lady"---done the Mexican way. It was actually pretty funny, as far as this type of fare is concerned. Here we had: Eduardo 'Lalo el Mimo' de la Pena, the very funny veteran actress Susana Cabrera, Roberto Montiel, the funny Gaston Padilla, Anais de Melo, and Wanda Seux (she's the blond on the cover). The very pretty Mireya Cantu ("Las Computadoras" 1982, "Cada quien su madre:ratero II" 1982, "Las perfumadas" 1983) did a very sexy striptease getting into a thermal pool that, really got things boiling!! Overall, a thoroughly entertaining sex-comedy. The DVD picture quality by Xenon Pictures is very good. NTSC, Spanish (no English subtitles), NR 88 mins.

Love and Peace,
Carlos Romero
